name: Rite of Eris
description:
Embark on an epic journey in “Rite of Eris”, a captivating 3D survivor roguelike game inspired by the intensity of Vampire Survivors, the characters of Paragon, and the immersive world of Hades.

In this game, you’ll navigate through a world of chaos, a tribute to Eris, the Greek goddess of strife and discord. Each playthrough is a unique rite, a test of your ability to thrive in the midst of turmoil. Will you succumb to the chaos, or will you harness it and survive against all odds?



Experience the thrill of survival in stunning cinematic 3D. Uncover hidden secrets, battle formidable foes, and navigate treacherous terrains. The world of Eris awaits you. Are you ready to accept the rite?



Unlock new characters, each with their own unique abilities, then jump into battle, unlocking powerful abilities along the way to aid your conquest against hordes of enemies. Awaken massive boss monsters and strategically use their attacks against other enemies! Learn and unlock new passive upgrades, and much more!



Currently includes 2 maps, 2 bosses, and 3 characters, but expanding to the full roster quickly!



Take on Rampage in the Ruins of Mystras.


Escape Poison Sevarog in the Tower of Hera.


Battle Terra in the Gladiator's Arena.
